data.name: Lichess / Pychess: Kaneo pieces
data.description: Kaneo piece set for Lichess, inspired by chess.com's Neo pieces. Chess.com's green board style is included, to use it, set the board style to 'green' on Lichess.

data.name: Lichess: Kaneo Midnight pieces
data.description:
Alternative version of my Kaneo piece set: midnight blue and moon yellow pieces. 
Gray board is included, to use it, set the board style to 'grey' on Lichess.

data.name: TechBBS Light theme
data.description: Light theme for TechBBS. Use the default light theme with this userstyle and install Fira Sans -typeface before use.

data.name: BLACK RED SHARDS V1.6
Recall OBC
data.description: A dark theme for Recall, as it may look like the OBC Theme somehow.

data.name: Wikipedia Clean White Plus
data.description: An improved version of AvijitGhosh82's Wikipedia Clean White: https://userstyles.org/styles/124164/wikipedia-clean-white

data.name: Hide fight results (Tapology)
data.description: Hides the fight results in a fighter's fight record unless hovered over.

data.name: MeWe Better Post Format
data.description:
- Shows full posts without a "See more" link to expand.
- Render HTML headers properly. Based on Bootstrap.
- Indents blockquotes and reduces the size of the border.

data.name: Something Awful Max Width
data.description: A simple style that allows you set a fixed max width for the forums (set to 1000px by default)

data.name: RTS.ch dark theme
data.description: Dark theme for the swiss news website rts.ch

data.name: gitlab.com black
